issues.description: The method singFarmSongVerse in the Farm class is declared as returning void in both the problem statement UML diagram and the template repository, but in the solution repository, it is implemented to return a String. This discrepancy could confuse students who are following the problem statement and template, leading them to believe the method should not return anything, while the solution suggests otherwise, potentially causing implementation errors if tests expect a String return.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the singFarmSongVerse method in the solution repository to return void instead of String, ensuring it aligns with the problem statement and template to avoid confusion and maintain consistency in the intended design.
